compilation_methodology.approach: Multi-regional compilation with cultural sensitivity and academic validation across Hindu-Muslim-Sikh contexts
quality_control: Native speaker review from multiple Hindi-speaking regions
Hindu, Muslim, and Sikh cultural sensitivity consultation
Gender sensitivity and feminist perspective inclusion
Legal compliance with Indian anti-discrimination laws
coverage_areas: Family honor and respect hierarchy violations
validation_process: Academic peer review by Hindi linguistics experts

script_handling.vowel_matras: Vowel mark attachment to consonant base
script_handling.inherent_vowel: Default 'a' vowel unless modified by matra

hinglish_considerations: Script mixing (Devanagari + Latin) in digital contexts

usage_notes.intended_use: Content moderation, profanity filtering, Hindi linguistics research, cultural sensitivity training, educational applications
usage_notes.cultural_sensitivity: Requires deep understanding of Indian family values, religious diversity, caste sensitivities, and gender dynamics
limitations: Bollywood influence constantly changing popular usage
Caste sensitivity varies by region and education
Religious sensitivity depends on community composition
Limited coverage of some regional Hindi variants
ethical_considerations: Respect for Indian cultural diversity and religious pluralism
Sensitivity to gender-based harassment and patriarchal structures
Recognition of family honor cultural importance
Balance between linguistic research and cultural respect
Consideration of diaspora heritage language preservation
special_considerations: Family honor attacks can provoke serious real-world violence
Caste-based discrimination is illegal and socially condemned
Religious blasphemy sensitivity varies by community composition
Gender-specific insults reflect and reinforce patriarchal structures
Bollywood influence normalizes some previously taboo language
Hinglish mixing creates hybrid expressions requiring special handling
Professional contexts need cultural awareness in moderation

profanity_characteristics: Strong family honor and respect hierarchies
Cosmopolitan mixing with Punjabi and English
